products.title: Hive Blackout Denim Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout denim perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Velvet Sky Light Blue Curtain
products.description: Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft curtainin sky light blue, adds a splash of light blue to your window.

products.title: Blossom, Blue Oar - Roller Blind
products.description: We fell in love with blue oar the moment we saw it because of the nocturnal resonance of the blue. It reminds us of seeing natural colours set against the dark evening sky - a time when the greens and pinks actually become magnified as their colourful backdrop fades to black. If you want to bottle this feeling, adding blue oar to your bathroom would be an inspired choice. It can be hard to find space for pictures and artwork in one of the more specialist spaces in the home, which means floral blinds offer a unique opportunity.

products.title: Stripy (Blackout), Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Stripy blue is a great way of incorporating the full range of blues into your house, from sky blue, light blue, all the way to navy. The variation in width of the stripes gives this high quality blackout blind a fresh and modern look. Stripy blue works perfectly when you are looking to add to, or create, a blue-themed kitchen or living room, to show of the true range of tones. Alternatively, why not fit the stripy blue in the hallway or landing, to give an often overlooked area of the home a more upbeat look? Stripy (blackout), blue - roller blind stripy blue is a great way of incorporating the full range of blues into your house, from sky blue, light blue, all the way to navy.

products.title: Osborne, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: The osborne aqua is made from a high quality fabric, and gives a modern take on a classically ornate plant-life patterning. An off-white background covered in a faint, smoky blue, the aqua combines a classic pattern with the most up-to-date colour combinations and tones. The aqua works fantastically in living rooms or dining rooms to break up a more dominant colour scheme, and can also serve as a subtle infusion of colour and design to an area of the house that you would like to keep more neutral, such as the hallway or bathroom.

products.title: Florance, Teal - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at the deep calming blue of florence teal, you feel at peace and at ease as your eye works its way across the leaves and petals. The artistic black outlines give the fabric a definitive quality that allow you to lose yourself in the moment as you escape to the country. Matching teal to a lush grass green to provide a natural balance and harmony of colour that will breathe new life into any room in the house.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: Enoki aqua uses a beautiful sea green to take your senses on an aesthetic journey they will remember forever. It's the kind of experience that changes the way you think about decor, and it's one that is encapsulated by the way in which the surrounding pattern gently changes with the light. A washed out blue is a great addition if you're looking to add a natural colour contrast that will fill your space.

products.title: Gingko Ocean Blue Roman Blind
products.description: If youre looking for a soft roman blind that will fall loosely within your window then look no further. The gentle curves within the tapestry on the gingko blind in ocean will delight you with its fluid blues. As the pattern is sewn into the fabric, it adds another dimension to long windows and smaller accents alike. Product id: db-rom1110 fabric colour: ocean blue material: 91% polyester 9% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Dragonfly Mineral Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Bring nature into your home with the azure mineral blue roman blind. The serious deep tones of this linen mix blind are balanced with a buoyant sketch of dragonflies to add the perfect dynamic to your home. Weve prepared the blind from a delicious weave of cotton and linen so its suitable for wherever you choose to hang it. Product id: db-rom1087 fabric colour: mineral blue material: 90% cotton 10% linen lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Dragonfly Aqua Roman Blind
products.description: Traditional hand drawn dragonflies adorn the azure roman blind in aqua blue for a taste of pastoral charm. Weve created this blind from an extravagant blend of cotton and linen so that not only will the blinds look great covering your windows with their abundant pleats, but you can single out any window, in any room in which to hang hem. Product id: db-rom1085 fabric colour: aqua material: 90% cotton 10% linen lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Bumblebee Teal Roman Blind
products.description: The clarke & clarke bumblebee fabric is on trend for todays living. Available in various colourways this design is printed on a teal background colour. Suitable for both the traditional and contemporary home, this blind will bring a little nature indoors all year round. You can guarantee with all their blinds, you will receive exceptional quality from their seamstresses without being stung on price.

products.title: Bumblebee Mineral Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Hang this linen mix blind against bright ochre walls, or deep blues and greys for an entirely distinct effect. You can choose to hang this in any room, whether it be an office or hallway, down to more humid rooms such as bathrooms and kitchens because weve manufactured the bumblebee mineral blue roman blind from a marvellous combination of cotton and linen to ensure the fabric breathes whilst holding ample folds.

products.title: Neo, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: Neo's aqua comprises of a speckled turquoise background on which sits an intricate symmetrical patterning, providing contemporary style to any window. And you won't lose all the light when you close it, as this filter blind allows light to penetrate through into your room. Place the aqua in the family bathroom, amongst white tiles and accenting accessories, or use for a cool, relaxing feel in a light taupe bedroom, where you're looking for both function and style, without the fuss.

products.title: Ardwell, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: The ardwell in aqua is made from a quality fabric that is functional, lightweight, and adorned with beautifully printed curvaceous plant designs that enliven the senses. The crisp white contrasts stunningly with the weathered beige background, whilst the duck-egg blue is always a calming colour to have in any home. Perfect for complementing rooms with plain walls and floors, the aqua is certainly a work of art all its own.

products.title: Tranquil, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: The tranquil in aqua is comprised of delicate teal and soft brown florals and leaves, set on a pale taupe-cream backdrop that will provide just enough shade and plenty of privacy, whilst still allowing some of that all-important daylight to trickle in. For a calming influence in your home office, surround the aqua with soft creams and light woods, only accenting occasionally with gentle teals and creamy cappuccinos.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Bluebell - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Devonshire, Denim - Roman Blind
products.description: Include the distinct and contemporary devonshire in denim in any surrounding. Featuring an array of royal blue threads to create a washed denim effect, this blind is woven to form a relaxed, casual blind with heaps of character and modern style. Form a casual yet current nautical theme in your family bathroom by combining the denim with a soothing and fresh white base. Add bleached woods and seaside-inspired features in royal blue and even sea-foam green for a fun and refreshing coastal atmosphere.

products.title: Kana Turquoise Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their kana collection of pleated free-hanging blinds features all of their favourite contemporary neutrals and bright colours. Their turqouise colour is a stunning rich light blue tone, perfect for a modern and sophisticated clean look. Product id: sdb-pfp0182 fabric colour: turquoise material: 100% polyester headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clips control type: manual tensioned pull handle energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - added thermal retention due to framework light filtering: yes kana turquoise perfect fit pleated blind in blue.
